content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pay attention!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" It is not recommended to wear shoes&outfits with logos of adidas direct competitors (Nike, Puma, ASICS, etc.) throughout business trips, calls with the customer, or other meeting types where you are representing adidas from the EPAM`s side\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As part of a global company, everyone needs to understand that \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"communication is the key in a multicultural environmen\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"t and the more efficient it is, the better rapport is built within the Team. The more we know about reasons of the other culture’s behavior and traditions, the easier it is for us to build an effective interaction & collaboration with each other. Furthermore, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"effective client communication has a critical role in keeping the business relations healthy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and ensuring project quality is maintained as per expectations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" In this regard, we'd like to draw your attention to the following training \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://grow.epam.com/templateView/178532\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"﻿\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#008ACE\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"﻿“\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/study/detailsPath?id=c8bfac17-ecf1-481e-a948-11d4f54c655c\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communication training plan for adidas\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#008ACE\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"that was specifically developed for us. It is aimed at increasing the level of cultural awareness, enhancing your communication skills, and helping to build positive cross-cultural working relationships (both with teammates and our client). Thus, I’d like to encourage all of you to pass this training in order to get the insights which I hope would be useful for you in your daily work. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#303240\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Full profiles provide an instant guide to history, politics and economic background of countries and territories, and background on key institutions. It helps businesses to make important decisions by tracking customer information, such as trends, demographics, and psychological graphics. It is much easier to communicate with customers when you actually know about your current customers. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"That is why we also recommend you to get acquainted with Germany country profile
